channel.title: How can i make it say once someone get 90skill and make it say it until 99?!?!?
channel.description: ok this is what i mean. I want my server to alert everyone when someone gets a 90 stat. then when they get 91 i want it to say player name has gotten 91 skill all the way up to 99. Please help with this u will get a REWARD.

item.title: How can i make it say once someone get 90skill and make it say it until 99?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @montalvom montalvom
item.description:
@montalvom wrote:

i fixed it already but thanks anyways

item.title: How can i make it say once someone get 90skill and make it say it until 99?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Read that case.

case 0: // Attack levelup sendFrame164(6247); sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced an attack level!", 6248); sendFrame126("Your attack level is now "+playerLevel[0]+" .", 6249); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced an attack level."); stillgfx(199, absY, absX); NpcDialogueSend = true; if (playerLevel[0] >= 90) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName +" now has "+ playerLevel[0] +" attack!"); } break;
Need that closing braceâ€¦Added for ya

Read full topic

item.title: How can i make it say once someone get 90skill and make it say it until 99?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

look for

public void levelup(int skill)

(this is for attack)

and you see this at the bottom of case 0:

if (playerLevel[0] == 99) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName +" now has "+ playerLevel[0] +" attack!");

change the

if (playerLevel[0] == 99) {

to

if (playerLevel[0] >= 90) {

on all of your skills and make sure to change the player level

Read full topic
